markdownRemark.html:
Broomfield Equestrian Centre is located in the natural environment of County Wicklow. The green fields, forest tracks and an evergreen farmland make this place an excellent place for holiday. One may take a refreshing ride on the well bred horses and ponies. For people going for horse riding, they must take a few practice rounds in the indoor and outdoor arenas and then head out for the countryside. Apart from equestrian activities, hacking and trekking facilities are also available.

Pam Horan BHSII, the chief instructor here ensures that the visitors have a safe holiday. All the horses here in Broomfield are trained by experienced masters. This centre is A.I.R.E approved.

Facilities: 25 acres, indoor/outdoor arenas and 25 boxes, only cash payments accepted, changing rooms and tuition classes available

Opening Time: 9 am – 9 pm (Monday to Saturday)

Admission Charge: €25 (Adult)

€15 (Children)

€20 (Students)
